solution_line_template: Thus, on Monday and Saturday, she biked M + 2M = 3M = {total_miles_week} - {miles_wednesday} = <<{total_miles_week}-{miles_wednesday}={combined_monday_saturday_miles}>>{combined_monday_saturday_miles} miles.
Therefore, on Monday, Mona biked M = {combined_monday_saturday_miles} / {coefficient_of_M} = <<{combined_monday_saturday_miles}/{coefficient_of_M}={miles_monday}>>{miles_monday} miles.
